      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MemBufferHolder<BigDataMemAllocator> BigDataMemAllocator.createBuffer(long size, boolean autoreclaim)
      create a memory buffer that is managed by its holder.
      MemChunkHolder<BigDataMemAllocator> BigDataMemAllocator.createChunk(long size, boolean autoreclaim)
      create a memory chunk that is managed by its holder.
      MemBufferHolder<BigDataMemAllocator> BigDataMemAllocator.resizeBuffer(MemBufferHolder<BigDataMemAllocator> mholder, long size)
      resize a specified buffer on its backed memory pool.
      MemChunkHolder<BigDataMemAllocator> BigDataMemAllocator.resizeChunk(MemChunkHolder<BigDataMemAllocator> mholder, long size)
      re-size a specified chunk on its backed memory pool.
